worldbank 0.0.1
  • Reference

World Bank country indicator data

Source: R/wb.R
wb_country_indicator.Rd

List all country indicators supported by the World Bank API.

wb_country_indicator(
  indicator = "NY.GDP.MKTP.CD",
  country = NULL,
  frequency = "yearly",
  lang = "en"
)

Arguments

indicator

character(1) indicator to query.

country

character() country to query. Default is NULL. If NULL, all countries are returned

lang

character(1) language to query. Default is "en".

Value

A data.frame with the available country indicators. The columns are:

year

The year.

indicator_id

The indicator ID.

indicator_name

The indicator name.

country_id

The country ID.

country_name

The country name.

country_code

The country code.

value

The indicator value.

unit

The indicator unit.

obs_status

The observation status.

decimal

The decimal.

References

http://api.worldbank.org/v2/country/{country}/indicator/{indicator}

Examples

wb_country_indicator("NY.GDP.MKTP.CD", "US")
#> # A tibble: 63 × 10
#>     year indicator_id   indicator_name    country_id country_name  country_code
#>    <int> <chr>          <chr>             <chr>      <chr>         <chr>
